name: أهم خمس أشياء تعلمتها حول ريادة الأعمال- الجزء الثاني

description: في التدوينة السابقة، بدأتُ سلسلة ملخصة بعض حول أهم الدروس التي تعلمتها حول ريادة الأعمال، كانت التدوينة السابقة مركزة بشكل كبيرة على عملية توليد الأفكار وإستغلال المشاكل وتحويلها إلى فرص والتغلب عل...

data.message:
For someone claiming to be a blogger and a copywriter you ought to know better than using something of such an intellectual nature (In layman's terms, something someone clearly had put an effort in producing) without giving them proper credit and attribution.

The picture you're using was originally tweeted [1] by Bill Gross, with proper attribution attached to it which you've clearly put an effort in removing [2]...

You're not even using the same blue colour [3] as the original. 

Kindly refrain from this improper behaviour and give credit where credit is due. Also the post adds nothing new but that's just IMHO.

[1]: https://twitter.com/bill_gross/status/578351982714322945
[2]: http://i1.wp.com/ahmedragab.me/wp-content/uploads/Screenshot_5.png
[3]: Original blue: #3CA6DA Rip-off blue: #55A4DD
